ComicInfo.Summary:
Post-invasion, an abandoned earth-born Martian was taken in by Uncle Woody and his blind niece. But the infant isn’t the only Martian still here… and the others are much more warlike, especially when they learn of the baby’s location amidst the human survivors.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Reg | Regular Cover | Sam Kieth | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Loston Wallace (a) & Stephen Downer (c) | 2 | RE | Retailer Exclusive Cover - Supernova Pop Culture Expo | John McCrea (a) & Andrew Elder (c) | 3 |
